Improvements.Description: Instead of using multiple if-else conditions to check the browser version, use a switch-case. It is more readable and efficient.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- if (browserVersion_ == BrowserVersion.INTERNET_EXPLORER) {
+ private String[] getAlertsForBrowser(Annotation annotation, BrowserVersion browserVersion_) {
Improvements.Description: The code for checking browser version and getting the expected alerts is repeated thrice for Alerts, BuggyWebDriver, HtmlUnitNYI annotations. This can be refactored into a separate method.
